sentence.Network_en: The wolffish is used as food in Britain.
sentence.Network_cn: 在英国狼鱼可以作为食物.

PerfectNetExp.exp: 色鬼调戏妇女时的怪叫
PerfectNetExp.abs: [俚]调戏或诱惑女人的男人, 色鬼【音】不协调音, 粗厉音起腐蚀[破坏]作用的...色鬼调戏妇女时的怪叫 wolffish wolf n. 【动】狼鱼 wolfhound [`wJlfhaJnd].
wolffgang 沃尔夫冈, wolffish 东方狼鱼, wolffian 描绘的解剖结构

means.word_mean: 1. large ferocious northern deep-sea food fishes with strong teeth and no pelvic fins
2. large elongate scaleless oceanic fishes with sharp teeth and a long sail-like dorsal fin
